title: Sodom no Hana ni Kiraboshi
sinopse:
"Him and I live in two different worlds." At least, that's what she thought until that day... Morino is a 2nd year middle schooler who tends to have a shy personality. One day, she sees Hasumi, one of the popular guys at school, crying all by himself. Morino tries to encourage him, but she also had a deep secret...

(Source: Shueisha, translated)

Included one-shot: Hajimari no Oto.
